A

ADD - Static variable in class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl
Indicates interest in entries which have been added.
ADD - Static variable in class com.sun.jndi.ldap.EntryChangeResponseControl
Indicates an entry which has been added.
ANY - Static variable in class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl
Indicates interest in entries which have been added, deleted, modified or renamed.

B

C

com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl - package com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl
Contains sort, virtual-list-view, and paged-results controls.

The control's criticality.

DirSyncControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for directory synchronization as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-dirsync-01.txt.
DirSyncControl() - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncControl
Constructs a dir-sync control.
DirSyncControl(boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncControl
Constructs a dir-sync control.
DirSyncControl(int, int, byte[], boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncControl
Constructs a dir-sync control.
DirSyncResponseControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncResponseControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for directory synchronization as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-dirsync-01.txt.
DirSyncResponseControl(String, boolean, byte[]) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.DirSyncResponseControl
Constructs a paged-results response control.

E

EntryChangeResponseControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.EntryChangeResponseControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for entry-change notification as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-psearch-02.txt.

Constructs a new instance of EntryChangeResponseControl.

getTargetOffset() - Method in class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.VirtualListViewResponseControl

P

PagedResultsControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.PagedResultsControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Control for paged-results as defined in RFC-2696.

Constructs a paged-results critical control.
PagedResultsControl(int, byte[], boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.PagedResultsControl
Constructs a paged-results control.
PagedResultsResponseControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.PagedResultsResponseControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for paged-results as defined in RFC-2696.
PagedResultsResponseControl(String, boolean, byte[]) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.PagedResultsResponseControl
Constructs a paged-results response control.
PersistentSearchControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for the persistent search mechanism as defined in draft-ietf-ldapext-psearch-02.txt.
PersistentSearchControl() - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl
Constructs a persistent search non-critical control.
PersistentSearchControl(int, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.PersistentSearchControl
Constructs a persistent search control.

S

setContextID(byte[]) - Method in class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.VirtualListViewControl
Sets a server-generated cookie in the virtual-list-view request.
SortControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for server-side sorting of search results as defined in RFC-2891.
SortControl(SortKey[], boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortControl
Constructs a server-side sort control.
SortControl(String[], boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortControl
Constructs a server-side sort control.
SortKey - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortKey.
This class implements a sort key which is used by the LDAPv3 Control for server side sorting of search results as defined in RFC-2891.
SortKey(String) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortKey
Constructs a new instance of SortKey.
SortKey(String, boolean, String) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortKey
Constructs a new instance of SortKey.
SortResponseControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortResponseControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Response Control for server-side sorting of search results as defined in RFC-2891.
SortResponseControl(String, boolean, byte[]) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.SortResponseControl
Constructs a new instance of SortResponseControl.

T

TreeDeleteControl - class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.TreeDeleteControl.
This class implements the LDAPv3 Request Control for Tree Delete as defined in draft-armijo-ldap-treedelete-02.txt The control has no control value.
TreeDeleteControl() - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.TreeDeleteControl
Constructs a tree delete critical control.
TreeDeleteControl(boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl.TreeDeleteControl
Constructs a tree delete control.
